text: Fatih Sultan Mehmet Bridge (also known as Second Bosphorus Bridge) is a bridge between Asia and Europe in Istanbul, Turkey. The bridge carries 8 lanes of E80 (European Route) that spans across the Bosporus strait. It is 1,510 m long. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Google aerial image of bridge * 3D-model ″Fatih Sultan Mehmet Bridge″ for Google Earth Category:Buildings and structures in Istanbul Category:Steel bridges Category:Transport in Turkey
title: Fatih Sultan Mehmet Bridge
